dmca.title: www.needlemen.com WAREZ Issue
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: info@sanctumart.com [mailto:info@sanctumart.com] 
Sent: Thursday, January 12, 2006 7:46 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fw: www.needlemen.com WAREZ Issue
Importance: High


The website www.needlemen.com you are hosting contains files that are sold
on various website.
Here is the link  to the main page http://www.vdrive.needlemen.com/tp/ and
in the index under Daz3d folder: http://www.vdrive.needlemen.com/tp/DAZ3D/
Daz3d RDL7 Expansion 2 is the property of  Sanctum Art, Inc and it used to
be sold at www.daz3d.com This person does not the right to share my files or
Daz3d! I have notified Daz3d about this website you are hosting. It is in
your best interest to terminate the website and give the personal contact
information of the holder of that website so we can pursuit in a legal
action. Thank you.
 
Sincerely,
Michael Rak
President of Sanctum Art, Inc
